sentences.en: So Tippy Toes went dancing merrily back and Papa Cotton - Tail waited for him again.
sentences.cn: 歪脚趾又欢蹦乱跳地回家去了.棉尾巴爸爸继续等他回来.

sentences.en: Tippy Toes said, " Oh Pa, may I go with you to town to - morrow? "
sentences.cn: 歪脚趾说: “ 哦,爸爸, 我明天可以和你一起去 么 ? ”

sentences.en: Tippy Toes went dancing merrily back and Papa Cotton - Tail waited for him.
sentences.cn: 歪脚趾欢蹦乱跳地回家去,棉尾巴爸爸在路上等他.等他回来后,两人又上路了.

sentences.en: Tippy was my constant companion for five years.
sentences.cn: 迪贝做了我五年的好朋友.

sentences.en: Tippy's death was the tragedy of my boyhood.
sentences.cn: 迪贝的死,是我童年时代的一幕悲剧!

sentences.en: Where do you suppose Tippy Toes wasand what do you suppose he was doing?
sentences.cn: 你们猜歪脚趾他在哪儿,在干什么呢?

words.tran_cn: 焊接在尖头上的，镶齿的
给小费的人；翻斗卡车；倾卸车之搬运夫
使倾斜（tip的过去分词）；轻拍
给小费；倾斜；翻倒；装顶端

trans.tran_cn: 容易倾斜的，不安定的，<英>头等的，漂亮的
